  2. IDF Northern Command chief says military has killed more than 500 terror operatives in Lebanon  The Times of Israel
  3. Israeli warplanes break sound barrier over Beirut, Lebanese security sources say  Reuters
  4. Israel Army Preparing For "Decisive Offensive" Against Hezbollah  NDTV
  5. Israeli troops 'exhausted, losing readiness everyday’ to expand war on Lebanon  The Cradle
